<h3 id="X39876">X(39876) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-OUTER-GREBE TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; -4*S*(a^2+b^2+c^2)*a^2-(-a^2+b^2+c^2)*(3*a^4+(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39876) = X(10783)-3*X(14912)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39876) lies on these lines: {2,19145}, {4,6}, {32,12257}, {39,12256}, {69,371}, {141,9540}, {182,3069}, {193,11294}, {372,25406}, {486,3618}, {487,14001}, {511,6459}, {524,26619}, {542,19054}, {1151,10519}, {1350,9541}, {1352,3068}, {1702,5847}, {1992,32421}, {3299,39901}, {3301,39900}, {3311,3564}, {3619,5418}, {3818,31412}, {5050,7584}, {5085,13935}, {5093,22810}, {5182,33341}, {5207,32432}, {5309,13674}, {5410,39871}, {5490,8950}, {5848,19082}, {5921,7585}, {6199,11898}, {6410,33750}, {6417,39899}, {6419,39893}, {6422,21736}, {6560,14927}, {6561,35840}, {6811,31403}, {7583,18440}, {7586,19146}, {7738,8982}, {7753,13794}, {7969,39898}, {8855,18928}, {8976,18358}, {10516,13910}, {11179,19053}, {11180,32787}, {12017,13966}, {12323,39660}, {13354,19089}, {13665,39884}, {13785,18583}, {13883,39885}, {13947,38118}, {13951,38110}, {13959,38029}, {14039,26289}, {18992,39870}, {18994,39872}, {18996,39873}, {19000,39877}, {19004,39878}, {19006,39879}, {19008,39880}, {19010,39881}, {19012,39882}, {19014,39883}, {19018,39886}, {19024,39889}, {19026,39890}, {19028,39891}, {19030,39892}, {19032,39895}, {19034,39896}, {19038,39897}, {19048,39902}, {19050,39903}, {24206,32785}, {35771,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39876) = reflection of X(1587) in X(6)<br>
X(39876) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 6776, 39888), (6, 3071, 14853), (6, 6776, 39875), (7582, 14912, 6)<br>
</p>
